1. Zoom CEO Eric Yuan wants AI clones in meetings  The Verge
  2. Zoom founder Eric Yuan wants 'digital twins' to attend meetings for you so you can 'go to the beach' instead  Fortune

  4. Zoom CEO is developing a strange solution to excessive work meetings  TheStreet
  5. The future is … sending AI avatars to meetings for us, says Zoom boss  The Guardian

item.title: Windows feature that screenshots everything labeled a security “disaster” - The Verge

item.title: Adobe scolded for selling 'Ansel Adams-style' images generated by AI - The Verge
